overview_of_class: Through studio assignments, screenings, readings, lectures, discussion, and/or workshops, students will be introduced to a wide range of time-based art practices as used in the visual arts, including performance, sound and video. No prerequisites. P/N permitted.
name: Introduction to Time Based Arts
title: WCAS ART 130-0-1 Introduction to Time Based Arts

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Through studio assignments, screenings, readings, lectures, discussion, and/or workshops, students will be introduced to a wide range of time-based art practices as used in the visual arts, including performance, sound and video. No prerequisites. P/N permitted.

subject: ART
